biotools.summary: a reference-based annotation tool for single cell ATAC-seq data.\n\nIn the first round gene-level annotation, AtacAnnoR compares gene activity profiles derived from scATAC-seq data with reference gene expression profiles, assigning a subset of query cells with reference cell type labels.

bioschemas.name: AtacAnnoR
bioschemas.summary: a reference-based annotation tool for single cell ATAC-seq data.\n\nIn the first round gene-level annotation, AtacAnnoR compares gene activity profiles derived from scATAC-seq data with reference gene expression profiles, assigning a subset of query cells with reference cell type labels.
